title: Surrender
description: Part Surrender Now an official member of the highly exclusive Dining Club, Grace has proven to herself-and to her insatiable lover David-that she has mastered the sexual delights the Club has to offer. As her reward, David reveals the secrets behind the Club's elusive Table Five, and Grace learns their adventure is far from over . . . Table Five is only open to the most elite Club members, and it promises to change Grace and David's relationship-for better or for worse. To earn her coveted spot at the table, Grace must confront Amber-the beauty intent on winning David's affection-in a sensual test that only one of them can pass. But Grace's passion for David has never been stronger, and nothing will stop her from securing her place at his side.
author: Marina Anderson
